title: Mushoku Tensei – Old Dragon’s Tale - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Mature   Seinen
author: Rifujin na Magonote   理不尽な孫の手
description:
There was an ancient man-shaped dragon living on a mountain, and by his side a girl who looked after him. 
One day, the girl asked the dragon, 'Please tell me more about you.' 
The dragon answered, 'Fine, but it’s a long story.”

— A Spin-off Work of Mushoku Tensei>
